original_text: For the Lord had said to Moses, “Each day one leader is to bring his offering for the dedication of the altar.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 이르시기를 지휘관들은 하루 한 사람씩 제단의 봉헌물을 드릴지니라 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: For the Lord had said to Moses
Each day one leader is to bring his offering
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 한 지도자가 그의 예물을 가져와야 하며

sentences.original_text: for the dedication of the altar
